DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS : FREE DISPOSAL OFFERED FOR HAZARDOUS WASTE
DOC.TEXT: Residents can dispose_of used motor_oil , paints , cleaners , pesticides , car_batteries and other household hazardous waste for free at Veterans Stadium , 5000 Lew Davis St. , from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. June 4 . Because such waste can pollute ground and ocean water , disposing_of it in trash_cans , sewers and storm drains is illegal , officials said . There is no limit to how much waste will be accepted , as long as it comes from residents ' households . No waste generated by businesses will be accepted . The roundup is sponsored by the Los Angeles County Department of Public Works and the County Sanitation Districts . For more information , call : ( 800 ) 552-5218 or ( 310 ) 908-4286 .
